itemListElement.name: Blueberry Apple Whole grain Cake. Vegan

@graph.name: Blueberry Apple Whole Grain Cake. Vegan
@graph.description: Blueberry Apple Whole Grain Cake. Made with wheat and oats it's moist and dense because of the thick fruit syrup. So delicious. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 4 tablespoons raw sugar or jaggery grated
2/3 cup self rising flour (or all purpose flour + 1/2 teaspoon baking powder)
1 tablespoon flax seed meal or flax seeds coarsely ground
1 tablespoon high fat oil (I used virgin coconut oil)

recipeInstructions.text: You can prepare the compote beforehand and keep. Blend the blueberries, apple, sugar and cinnamon in a blender into a smooth puree. use a little water if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: You can prepare the compote beforehand and keep. Blend the blueberries, apple, sugar and cinnamon in a blender into a smooth puree. use a little water if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook this puree on low heat till it thickens to a thick syrup consistency. about 15-20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook this puree on low heat till it thickens to a thick syrup consistency. about 15-20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add flax meal, vinegar, oil, and 1/4 (60ml) cup almost hot water.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add flax meal, vinegar, oil, and 1/4 (60ml) cup almost hot water.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix it well till the mixture is well combined. Add in the oats and sugar, mix well and keep aside for a few minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix it well till the mixture is well combined. Add in the oats and sugar, mix well and keep aside for a few minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the flours, salt, baking powder.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix the flours, salt, baking powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the fruit syrup and the flours to the flax meal mixture. Mix lightly.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the fruit syrup and the flours to the flax meal mixture. Mix lightly.

recipeInstructions.text: If the mixture seems too dry, add in a few tablespoons water at a time. Mix until just about combined like a muffin batter.
recipeInstructions.name: If the mixture seems too dry, add in a few tablespoons water at a time. Mix until just about combined like a muffin batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a mini loaf well. Drop batter in and even it out.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease a mini loaf well. Drop batter in and even it out.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated oven at 350 degrees F for 40-45 minutes or until the toothpick inserted in the Middle comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated oven at 350 degrees F for 40-45 minutes or until the toothpick inserted in the Middle comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Let cool a little before removing from pan and slicing! Serve warm as is, or topped with blueberry compote or the strawberry orange one in the pictures.:)
recipeInstructions.name: Let cool a little before removing from pan and slicing! Serve warm as is, or topped with blueberry compote or the strawberry orange one in the pictures.:)
